channel.title: Gowalla on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in Gowalla on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Gowalla needs business tools for super users
item.description: Gowalla may just be a buzzword for the latest social media marketing trend - but with more people getting smart or superphones that ‘can’ multi-task location based _mobile social networks_ are set to be the in thing.

item.title: Gowalla New Users heading toward 350000
item.description: Gowalla and Foursquare are getting more and more attention and a few companies are starting to monitor and track these services.

item.title: Essential Location Based Apps for Android Mobiles
item.description: Everyone is used to taking their mobile with them, so that means location based apps for mobiles will start to become more popular.

item.title: Foursquare user base to hit 2 million this week
item.description: Foursquare and Gowalla have been grabbing the headlines and few companies are starting to monitor and track these services.

item.title: Foursquare most popular location checkin game in London
item.description: Foursquare is still the UK’s most popular location based check-in game to play on your mobile.

item.title: Gowalla? Foursquare open for Business? Who will setup a business team in Europe First
item.description: Foursquare is now open to business and is moving beyond geo-tagging and location based social networking.
